newsitem.title: USA: Forte Computer reverse split approved.
newsitem.headline: Forte Computer reverse split approved.

text.p: Forte Computer Easy Inc said Wednesday its shareholders had approved a one-for-10 reverse stock split and a name change to American Architectural Products Corp.
Following the split, the company plans to apply for listing on the Nasdaq Small Cap Market, it said.
"The company anticipates receiving approval from Nasdaq for a new trading symbol of AAPC," it said.
A company official said the reverse split will reduce the number of shares outstanding to about 12 million, including preferred shares covertible to common stock.
American Architectural makes products for residential, commercial and architectural applications in the fenestration industry.
